text: The Forest is a survival horror video game developed and published by Endnight Games. The game takes place on a remote forested peninsula, where the player character Eric LeBlanc must fight off cannibalistic monsters while searching for his son Timmy after a plane crash. The game was released for Windows in April 2018, and for the PlayStation 4 in November 2018. The game was a success, selling over five million copies by the end of 2018. A sequel game, Sons of the Forest was announced to be released in October 2022, but was delayed before the final release date was set to be in early 2023. ==References== Category:2018 video games Category:2010s horror video games Category:Early access video games Category:Indie video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Survival horror video games Category:Survival video games Category:Video games about cannibalism Category:Video games about missing people Category:Windows games
title: The Forest (video game)
